paragraphs: This is the federal website for Aboriginal and Northern Development Canada. I worked with a team of programmers to update the website to current HTML5 and ensure all content was compliant to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.
The Albatross Motel is located near the main end in Wasaga Beach. This is a small business wordpress website currently being customized.
A small business wordpress website for a local self employed beauty consultant and make up artist.
